headline: Costco Lawsuit Over Rotisserie Chicken Puts Kirkland Trust In Focus
summary: A nationwide class action lawsuit has been filed against Costco over "No Preservatives" claims on its Kirkland Signature Seasoned Rotisserie Chicken. Plaintiffs allege the product labeling is misleading given the ingredients used in the popular private label item. The case focuses on Costco's food advertising practices and potential impacts on consumer trust in store brand offerings. For investors following Costco Wholesale, ticker NasdaqGS:COST, the lawsuit centers on one of the most...
